title: Configure Secure Boot Settings and Additional Process Hardening

controls.title: Ensure bootloader password is set
controls.description: Verify GRUB2 bootloader password is configured

controls.title: Ensure access to bootloader config is configured
controls.remediation: Run: chown root:root /boot/grub2/grub.cfg && chmod og-rwx /boot/grub2/grub.cfg && chown root:root /boot/grub2/grubenv && chmod og-rwx /boot/grub2/grubenv
controls.description: Verify bootloader config files have proper permissions (0600 root:root)

controls.title: Ensure address space layout randomization (ASLR) is enabled
Ensure core dumps are restricted
controls.remediation: Add '* hard core 0' to /etc/security/limits.conf and set fs.suid_dumpable = 0
controls.description: Verify core dumps are restricted via limits.conf and sysctl

controls.title: Ensure prelink is not installed
controls.description: Verify prelink package is not installed

controls.title: Ensure Automatic Error Reporting is not enabled
controls.remediation: Run: systemctl disable --now abrtd && dnf remove abrt
controls.description: Verify ABRT (Automatic Bug Reporting Tool) is disabled
